welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bo'z, a charming city known for its ancient historical sites and friendly locals! Get ready to immerse yourself in its beauty and culture, and indulge in all that Bo'z has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Andizhan Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Andizhan Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
